summary: The term "ground staff" refers to personnel involved in the organization of transport, specifically within the aviation sector. In the context of EU legal and regulatory frameworks, ground staff play a crucial role in ensuring compliance with safety, security, and operational standards set forth by various EU regulations. Their responsibilities include managing passenger services, baggage handling, and coordinating aircraft movements on the tarmac. Effective organization of transport relies heavily on the efficiency and training of ground staff, which is essential for maintaining high service quality and operational integrity in the aviation industry.
